alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Houston; Mower; Olmsted; Wabasha; Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 9:36PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact parts of southeast Minnesota... At 934 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Oronoco to near Elma. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Elgin around 945 PM CDT. Plainview around 950 PM CDT. Buffalo City and Altura around 1000 PM CDT. Winona, Goodview and Rollingstone around 1005 PM CDT. People at the Fillmore County Fairgrounds should seek shelter due to a lightning risk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for north central and northeastern Iowa...and southeastern Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: Fillmore; Houston; Mower; Olmsted; Wabasha; Winona
